data.title: Bruce Willis, Kristen Stewart in Woody Allen's next
data.meta_description: Actors Bruce Willis, Kristen Stewart, Jesse Eisenberg and Blake Lively have come on board for veteran director Woody Allen's next film
data.text:
Los Angeles, Aug 5 (IANS) Actors Bruce Willis, Kristen Stewart, Jesse Eisenberg and Blake Lively have come on board for veteran director Woody Allen’s next film, which will go on the floors later this month.

The makers announced the cast of the film on Tuesday, adding that the untitled project will be shot here and in New York, reports Efe.

The film will also star Parker Posey, who was in Allen’s “Irrational Man”, Jeannie Berlin, Corey Stoll and Ken Stott.

The “Blue Jasmine” director’s new project will reunite Stewart and Eisenberg, who starred together in “Adventureland” and will also appear in the action comedy “American Ultra”.

However, the plot of the film is not out yet with the storyline shrouded in secrecy.
